text: Pontoon Beach is a village in Illinois in the United States. It is located in Madison County, Illinois. It is part of the greater St. Louis metropolitan area and is approximately 12 miles northeast of downtown St. Louis, Missouri. The village is near major highways, including Interstate 270 and Interstate 255, which makes it easily accessible for commuters and travelers. Pontoon Beach offers various recreational opportunities, such as parks and outdoor activities, due to its location near bodies of water like Horseshoe Lake. The community has a mix of residential, commercial, and industrial areas. Category:Villages in Illinois
